channel.title: Comments on: No Car Batteries on Planes

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/06/02/car-batteries-planes/#comment-4226">julien51</a>.
That is the scary part, this rule probably came about because someone actually tried to pack a car battery in a carry on.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to julien51.

That is the scary part, this rule probably came about because someone actually tried to pack a car battery in a carry on.

item.title: By: julien51
item.dc:creator: julien51
item.description: I'm sure we'd be surprised to see what people bring as "carry on items" on flights. That's just the law of big numbers. If 1 person in 1Bn brings a car battery, that's 3 people a year based on the number I quickly found online :)
item.content:encoded: I’m sure we’d be surprised to see what people bring as “carry on items” on flights. That’s just the law of big numbers. If 1 person in 1Bn brings a car battery, that’s 3 people a year based on the number I quickly found online ðŸ™‚
